title: Integration of AI-Based Mathematics Education Tools: Structured Training Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers, focusing on AI tool utilization in limited digital infrastructure environments

learning_goals: Participants can explain methods for generating math problems and providing personalized feedback using AI tools like ChatGPT
Participants can identify privacy issues arising from AI tool integration and develop response strategies through structured training models
Participants can evaluate the feasibility of introducing AI tools in math classes by applying the Perceived Usefulness (PU) and Perceived Ease of Use (PEU) framework
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
